name: ABBYY FineReader Dictionary
summary: An AME file is a custom dictionary created for use with ABBYY FineReader, a PDF viewing, editing, and conversion application. Users can create AME dictionaries in FineReader 12 and earlier versions. The Windows version of FineReader stores AME files in its' /​~AppData/​Roaming/​ABBYY/​FineReader/​VersionNumber/​UserDictionaries directory.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
